prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular Japanese warrior, fierce expression, spiky golden-yellow hair, battle-hardened physique, 8k photorealistic image, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, individual hair strands, realistic fabric weave on gi, sweat and battle damage, sharp focus, subsurface scattering
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, doll, low quality, deformed, blurry, (bright yellow hair:1.2), helmet hair, (friendly smile:1.3), modern clothes
